name: Crazy Cat Collector (Alaris)
description:
Crazy Cat Collector is a platforming game about Agatha, a crazy cat lady!  

Agatha's cats have escaped, and she is on a quest to bring all 16 of them back home!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move Left and Right

Space - Jump / Sneeze Jump (when available)

Z - Interact / Confirm Menu / Pick Up Cat / Place Cat in Box

X - Drop Cat

Credits:

Development/Programming/Art - Tom Malanowski 'Alaris'

Music - M. Reynolds

Cat Sounds - IgnasD

0.2 Patch Notes:

  • Fixed Issue where player can fall off the map in Level 1.
